meanings.sent1: The angiocardiographic procedure helped the doctors understand the heart better.
meanings.sent2: The angiocardiographic images showed the blood vessels in great detail.
meanings.sent3: The angiocardiographic results were so clear that even the patients could see their own hearts!
meanings.sent4: Her angiocardiographic knowledge was like a map revealing the hidden pathways of the heart.
meanings.sent5: The angiocardiographic technology made the heart's inner workings come alive.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the visualization of blood vessels and the heart using radiographic techniques.
meanings.sent1: The angiocardiographic test provided detailed images of the heart's blood vessels.
meanings.sent2: Doctors used angiocardiographic scans to study the heart's structure.
meanings.sent3: The angiocardiographic equipment hummed softly as it captured the heart's secrets.
meanings.sent4: His angiocardiographic expertise was like having x-ray vision into the heart.
meanings.sent5: The angiocardiographic images glowed on the screen, revealing the heart's intricate network.
